abstract: Quite a European party. That was my biggest impression listening to InBev‘s conference call Thursday morning. As everyone knows by now, InBev has made a proposal to acquire Anheuser-Busch at $65 a share.
lead_paragraph: Quite a European party. That was my biggest impression listening to InBev‘s conference call Thursday morning. As everyone knows by now, InBev has made a proposal to acquire Anheuser-Busch at $65 a share.
